Greeting.Name: JIMUK CHOI
Greeting.Slogan: Creativity, Skill, and Communication in Every Design

WhoIam.Title: Who I am
WhoIam.MainText: I am truly passionate about what I do. It’s not just about creating visually appealing designs, but about solving problems and delivering a better user experience.
WhoIam.SubText: Hello, I’m Jimuk Choi, a UI/UX designer with over 3 years of experience. I prioritize user experience and strive for designs that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing. With skills in design, 3D, video, and development, I focus on simplifying complex user flows. I particularly excel in creating designs that are feasible for implementation. I have worked on projects across various industries, and my goal is to continue creating innovative designs that make a positive impact.
